text: Ian Wright is an English football striker, who played for Crystal Palace, Arsenal and England, and is now a television presenter. Ian Wright may also refer to: *Ian Wright (footballer, born 1972), English football defender, who played for Bristol Rovers, Hull City and Hereford United, amongst others * Ian Wright (rower) (born 1961), New Zealand Olympic rower *Ian Wright (traveller) (born 1965), English traveller and television presenter, and host of Globe Trekker *Ian Wright (illustrator) (born 1953) *Ian Wright (engineer), co- founder of Tesla Motors ==See also== *Iain Wright (born 1972), British Labour politician
title: Ian Wright (disambiguation)
